name: It Didn't Have to End This Way
name_original: It Didn't Have to End This Way
description:
CW: Eco grief, solastalgia, depression, death.

The world has ended. You are a restless ghost, unable to move on.

Controls: Use arrow keys to move and advance dialogue.

This bitsy is the first of what will hopefully end up being a project with 12 games (one per month). If you'd like to support this and other projects, consider joining my patreon!
